no.ntnu.Battleship

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.Battleship.Platform

  • public class Platform
extends java.lang.Object
    Each unit on the board is represented by a platform. Each platform has one or more devices, depending on its size.
    Author:
    HÃ¥vard

      Tells the platform to fire at the specified location
